requirements.description:
AI Solution for Lost Card Scenarios - Design and implement an AI-powered solution to assist customers in lost card scenarios, reducing resolution time and improving user experience.
 The solution should:
 • Automatically identify lost card situations via chatbot or triggers.
• Guide secure verification.
• Block lost cards and initiate replacements.
• Integrate with CRM and card management systems.
• Offer empathetic, human-like support.
requirements.llm_analysis_feasibility_reasoning: The process is entirely digital, with all actions occurring within software systems. The availability of RESTful integrations and a decision framework in place suggests that automated reasoning, planning, and execution are supported.
llm_analysis_key_insights: Integration with CRM and card management systems provides necessary interfaces for end-to-end process automation.
The CAMS API offers a robust data source for identifying lost card situations.
An AI-powered chatbot can handle customer interactions with human-like empathy, enhancing user experience while automating standard procedures.
llm_analysis_automation_challenges: Ensuring secure customer verification without compromising user experience.
Maintaining up-to-date and accurate integrations with multiple external systems.
requirements.llm_analysis_recommended_approach: Leverage AI agents to automate customer interaction, verification, and backend processing through established digital interfaces, ensuring scalable and efficient handling of lost card scenarios.
llm_analysis_next_steps: Design AI conversation flows for chatbot interactions.
Develop integration modules for CRM and card management systems using RESTful APIs.
